DOC.brief_summary: PRCT multicenter study evaluate non-operative treatment protocol treat ER-stress negative unimalleolar Weber-B type fibular fracture . Groups : 1 . 3 week removable splint 2 . 3 week cast 3 . 6 week cast . Follow-up visit 3 , 6 12 week 1 2 year injury . In time X-rays laterally mortise projection . Ankle functional outcome questionnaire : Olerud-Molander score , FAOS RAND-36 VAS follow up-visits 6 12 week 1 2 year .
DOC.brief_title: PRCT-study Different Non-operative Treatment Protocols ER-stress Negative Weber-B Unimalleolar Ankle Fractures .
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective randomize control multicenter study evaluate non-operative treatment protocol treat ER-stress negative unimalleolar Weber-B type fibular fracture . Groups : 1 . 3 week removable splint 2 . 3 week cast 3 . 6 week cast . Follow-up visit 3 , 6 12 week 1 2 year injury . In time X-rays laterally mortise projection . Ankle functional outcome questionnaire : Olerud-Molander score , FAOS RAND-36 VAS follow up-visits 6 12 week 1 2 year .
DOC.criteria: Stable WeberB type fibula fracture ERstress negative 16 year old Willingness participate study prove signature date Walking without aid accident Treatment start within 7 day injury Prior ankle fracture significant fracture area ankle leg Bilateral ankle fracture Pathological fracture Diabetes mellitus significant periferial neuropathy municipality Residence else catchment area Oulu university hospital Tampere university hospital Patient 's understanding cooperation inadequate
